title: Death Comes Calling
description: No one can outrun death. Edith Cooper was only a child when she was in an accident that claimed her mother's life, but left her unharmed. Ten years later, Death seems to be haunting her every step as Edith is plagued by a strange series of near-misses. Enter the mysterious stranger, who somehow manages to show up at just the right moment each time Edith finds herself in trouble.
author: Kristine Adler
